description.message: GPT-4 Vision Capture Extension â€“ your smart companion for instant information retrieval from any part of your web browsing experience. Using the cutting-edge capabilities of OpenAI's GPT-4 Vision API, this extension allows you to capture a portion of your webpage, ask questions, and receive contextually relevant answers.
